IEEE Draft Guide for Commissioning High-Voltage Direct-Current (HVDC) Converter Stations and Associated Transmission Systems

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: General guidelines for commissioning high-voltage direct-current (HVDC) converter stations and associated transmission systems are provided. These guidelines apply to HVDC systems utilizing 6-pulse or 12-pulse thyristor-valve converter units operated as a two-terminal HVDC transmission system or an HVDC back-to-back system.
